Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the power authority to create the New York State small business development program
Summary: Authorizes the power authority to create the New York State small business development program.
LawCode: Add ยง1009-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to allowing the power authority to create the New York State small business development program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
